Cactus leaves can be used as a substitute for tea. Cactus leaf tea is a classic cold-resistant tea, which can help prevent colds.
The sap in the cactus leaves has high concentrations of amino acids and polysaccharides, and can be made into nutritional juice and dietary beverages.
The leaves of the cactus are used to make paper, called cactus paper. It has good chemical and heat resistance and can be used in industry, medicine and other fields.
Cactus leaves are often used to make baskets and containers. The cactus can absorb water when placed in a dry place, and can prevent fire in storage.
Cactus can be made into beautiful decorations. Its thin and flat leaves are often made into handicrafts and beautiful paintings.
